TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeResolvingOptionsAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Used to configure how a [!INCLUDE[wfd1](../../add/includes/wfd1-md.md)] initializes type-resolver and type-browser dialogs to enable a user to select a type for arguments, variables, and generic type activities.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.TypeResolvingOptionsAttribute"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions options) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.TypeResolvingOptionsAttribute"> class with specified type resolving options.

Gets or sets the options used to configure how a [!INCLUDE[wfd1](../../add/includes/wfd1-md.md)] initializes type-resolver and type-browser dialogs to enable a user to select a type for arguments, variables, and generic type activities.
Docs.value: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions"> that specifies the options available for how a [!INCLUDE[wfd2](../../add/includes/wfd2-md.md)] initializes type-resolver and type-browser dialogs to enable a user to select a type for arguments, variables, and generic type activities.
